programs.title: Welcome Programs
programs.description: Airport PIckups, Welcome Dinners, City Orientation, Campus Tours, Welcome Gift Bags.

programs.title: Practical Help
programs.description: Moving Help, Furniture programs, Tax Clinics, Career Mentorship.

programs.title: ESL Programs
programs.description: English as a Second Language classes, English Conversation Partners, English Cafes.

programs.title: Friendship & Hospitality
programs.description: Friends for Dinner Holiday Meals, Group Outings and Trips, Weekly or Monthly Dinners, FOCUS club (Friends of Overseas College & University Students).

programs.title: Spiritual Exploration
programs.description: Alpha Courses, Interactive Bible Studies & discussion, Connection to church communities.

programs.title: Graduating Students
programs.description: Help connecting to other communities in a new city, helping prepare students to move home, Connecting students with churches to welcome returning students.
